feed.title: Pi-hole Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove option to set static IP address if DHCPCD is installed by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5111
  • Do not remove -all|exact when not surrounded by space in query.sh by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5300
  • Add code to remove old lighttpd config files left over from v5. by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5314
  • Switch to new branch name for FTL v6 development by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5319
  • Set new gravity database version to 16 by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5328
  • Add /var/log/pihole/webserver.log to the logrotate scripts by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5329
  • If ${USER} variable is blank, then populate it with whoami by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5341
  • Remove webpage.sh by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5357
  • Remove fake user agent when downloading adlist by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5367
  • Ignore ABP style entries in debug log dig test by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5382
  • Ensure pihole-FTL can write to all files in /etc/pihole, /run/pihole and /var/log/pihole by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5356
  • Add antigravity support to gravity by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5330
  • Some verbiage change to outputs (plus a couple of comments) by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5406
  • Disable checkout function for (official) docker containers by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5416
  • Allow pihole to access subdirs in /etc/pihole by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5427
  • Remove Chronometer by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5423
  • Set owner of gravity output files to pihole by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5419
  • Update query.sh to use FTL's API instead of directly interacting with the database by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5361
  • Add a final message to gravity by @rdwebdesign in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5441
  • Avoid printing getFTLConfigValue return in statusFunc() by @rdwebdesign in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5442
  • Logrotate config file needs to be owned by root by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5444
  • Remove temp dir created when downloading FTL by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5429
  • BREAKING Drop support for ancient ARMv4 and ARMv5 by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5445
  • Fix gravity swapping by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5455
  • Fix and simplify binary download by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5451
  • Use suffixed temp file by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5457
  • Tweak Pi-hole's debug facility for v6 by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5461
  • Remove idn2 as punycode conversion is handled by FTL by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5468
  • Start counting at postion 1 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5470
  • Check for valid OS via IPv4 and IPv6 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5305
  • When setting a blank password, use webserver.api.password instead of webserver.api.pwhash by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5465
  • Tweak help text of pihole setpassword by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5476
  • pihole -d: Include pihole.toml only once by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5478
  • Move custom.list to /hosts/custom.list by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5488
  • Improve v6 debug log and remove leftovers by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5481
  • Support special webserver.port ports ending in "s" (secure) and "r" (redirect) by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5499
  • Use files.gravity_tmp as temporary directory for the intermediate lists by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5504
  • Treat FTL return data as strings by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5509
  • Bash completion by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5516
  • Remove obsolete sudo file by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5514
  • Simplify pihole -v by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5517
  • Add "-ni" to all sqlite3 invocations by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5518
  • pihole -d: Fix gateway ping if it is a LL address by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5527
  • Fix failing tests in development-v6 branch by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5542
  • Do not store remote version in versions file if on custom branch by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5549
  • Use 204 return code for deleted sessions by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5541
  • Drop Fedora 36 and add Fedora 39 to the test suite by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5482
  • Test ftl.pi-hole.net availability by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5563
  • Make IDs of anti-/gravity lists available in vw_(anti)gravity by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5526
  • Remove local.list and openVPN traces by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5480
  • Fix gravity by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5573
  • Allow adlist duplicates by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5572
  • Highlight "### CHANGED" strings in the debug log of pihole.toml by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5601
  • Verify remote FTL checksum by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5603
  • Fix edge-case where an adlist domain is blocked by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5571
  • Improve changed binary message during update process by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5621
  • Only use local files (file://) when they have explicit permissions a+r by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5622
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 and Fedora 40, remove Fedora 38 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5657
  • Also check for IPv6 address for configured DNS servers by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5560
  • Migrate dnsmasq config files by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5479
  • Fix version check for release Docker images by @jacklul in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5667
  • Add CAP_SYS_TIME to FTL's ambient capabilities by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5676
  • Remove CentOS8 from test suite by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5682
  • Add pytest-clarity to test environment to improve error log output by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5692
  • Add protocol validation when downloading blocklist from URL by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5698
  • Fix minor spelling mistake by @eltociear in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5704
  • Finish core v6 implementation by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5689
  • Remove obsolet getFTLPIDFile() by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5710
  • Remove obsolet files and log file symlink code by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5711
  • Merge development > development-v6 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5725
  • [fix] [v6] typo in bash-completion allow-regex option by @allendema in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5729
  • Fix setting query logging and privacy level by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5724
  • Add missing creation of table antigravity in migration script 16 to 17 by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5737
  • Add pihole api [endpoint] callback suitable for local API requests by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5736
  • Make the help text of "pihole checkout [what] [branch]" more colorful by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5734
  • Update existing logrotate files to inlcude webserver.log by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5738
  • Disable SELINUX on CentOS 9 test dockerfile by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5743
  • Fix pihole status on not-ready states by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5747
  • Disable SELINUX on CentOS 9 test dockerfile v5 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5744
  • Resolve merge conflicts (again) by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5745
  • Remove obsolet Debian 10 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5707
  • Wait after restarting FTL before trying to check version by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5613
  • Tweak/gravity dns by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5752
  • Fix risk of popd without a pushd by @SkyLined in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5701
  • Account for renaming of devel branch on web repo by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5753
  • Fix wrong message being displayed while waiting for the DNS by @jacklul in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5757
  • Add /etc/pihole/dnsmasq.conf to debug log (stripped-down version) by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5740
  • Return early during v6 migration if migration dir exists by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5766
  • Revert "Return early during v6 migration if migration dir exists" by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5768
  • Add fallback option for OS check without hard-coded nameserver by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5751
  • Remove lines containing Adguard JavaScript rules from adlists by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5754
  • Add database optimization and gravity timing by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5773
  • Grouped common dependencies of distros by @WouterServaes in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5762
  • Fix removing old man page by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5789
  • Show version information after a web update by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5788
  • Remove the restartdns functionality and promote the reloaddns functions by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5780
  • Remove restartdns: Redux by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5791
  • Add color by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5798
  • Use pihole.toml to decide if installer runs on an update by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5790
  • Fix gavity version 19 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5801
  • Do not print FTL update check details on pihole -up by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5800
  • Exit 1 on failure by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5803
  • Improved error message for invalid protocol in adlist download by @Seva41 in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5806
  • Fix errors on fresh installations while setting privacy levels and query logging due to absence of pihole.toml by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5799
  • Add Fedora 41 and remove Fedora 39 from tests by @rdwebdesign in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5813
  • Remove remaining traces of audit log by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5817
  • Fix possible gravity permissions issue by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5819
  • Fix empty adlists by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5821
  • Remove Ubuntu 23 tests, it is EOL by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5822
  • Fix ARP flush command by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5823
  • move the sourcing of utils.sh outside of installPihole by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5825
  • Remove no-longer-needed utils by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5826
  • Install dependencies by creating a meta package on-the-fly by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5785
  • Fix rare case when apt and rpm package managers are found by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5827
  • Improve v6 user output by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5829
  • Improve dependency package output by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5828
  • Fix v5 -> v6 update by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5832
  • Speedup api response handling by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5833
  • Exit early when neither service nor systemctl commands are available by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5834
  • Disable lighttpd if found by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5835
  • Remove now unused function test_dpkg_lock() by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5848
  • Improve lighttpd disabling by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5849
  • Explicitly migrate from v5 to v6 by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5830
  • Remove unused code from debug log and skip some tests inside containers by @rdwebdesign in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5854
  • Gravity database resilience by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5818
  • Use a different method to identify if a gravity restore succeeded by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5868
  • Fix counting of domains in the gravity summary by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5881
  • Gravity: Use ETags by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5867
  • Move gravity list cache into dedicated directory by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5869
  • Show only enabled domains/regex in the final gravity message by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5884
  • Remove outdated dns-servers.conf by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5883
  • Add call to os_check in the update script by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5845
  • Decide if the content was changed before passing over to FTL by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5872
  • installer: use a drop-in to disable systemd-resolved stub listener by @enr0n in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5885
  • Amend warning on gravity tree build failure by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5888
  • Fix database integrity check in debug log by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5889
  • Pi-hole core v6.0.0 by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5842

New Contributors

  • @jacklul made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5667
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5704
  • @allendema made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5729
  • @SkyLined made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5701
  • @WouterServaes made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5762
  • @Seva41 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5806
  • @enr0n made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5885

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.18.4...v6.0

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v6.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix i386 fallback download by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5903

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v6.0...v6.0.1

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v6.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Apply chosen upstream DNS on fresh install by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5938
  • Fix empty password detection by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5935

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v6.0.1...v6.0.3

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v6.0.4
entry.content:
This should fix all the migrations issues once and for all. Thanks to everyone involved in tracking down the issue.

This should also fix "botched" previous migrations when it detects setupvars.cconf

What's Changed

  • Don't set a random password on v5 -> v6 updates by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5960
  • Only run migration code if setupVars.conf exists. by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5969
  • Fix dnsmasq v5 to v6 config migration by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5968
  • Assure that Lighttpd conf-enabled symlink is removed by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5974
  • Print a more helpful message on pihole checkout in docker containers by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5963

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v6.0.3...v6.0.4

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v6.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • If there are no files to change, don't print an error by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5953
  • Improve dig error handlin in api.sh by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5965
  • Add missing trailing / when setting permissions of /etc/pihole by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5997
  • Update README.md - Fix Text+URL for allowlisting/denylisting by @jeroenhabets in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5993
  • Do not hide error messages when dealing with services by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5983
  • Do not overwrite TLS cert/key mode by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5998
  • Remove 'reconfigure' option by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5887
  • Removing kernel check based on discussion in Pi-Hole PR pi-hole#5957. by @UltChowsk in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6020
  • Improve update/fresh install detection by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6034
  • Fix find command syntax, remove log dir from search by @jacklul in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6035
  • Fix gravity.sh -- Alpine / Docker specific issue by @karolkania in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6030
  • Pi-hole Core v6.0.5 by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6042

New Contributors

  • @jeroenhabets made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5993
  • @UltChowsk made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6020
  • @karolkania made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/6030

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v6.0.4...v6.0.5
